body.p: Although the definition of ‘net selling price’ would be similar to a definition of ‘net fair value’, IASC decided to use the term ‘net selling price’ instead of ‘net fair value’. IASC believed that the term ‘net selling price’ better describes the amount that an enterprise should determine and that will be compared with an asset’s value in use.
